title: Accounting Leadership Education Utilizing AI and Creative Pedagogy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic accounting concepts and practical managerial experience
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based limited-technology program with offline workshops to promote reflective thinking

learning_goals: Learners can interpret accounting data and apply it to decision-making using AI analysis tools.
Learners can design activities that foster reflective thinking among team members using creative instructional design techniques in accounting education.
Learners can perform personalized accounting competency diagnostics and establish customized learning paths via an AI-based learning platform.
Learners achieve at least 80% proficiency in the summative evaluation at the end of the course.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
